data.persona: I came from the fertile valley when I was conscripted. The king needed strong farmer's sons to fight in the war. I am very unhappy here in the cold, damp, rainy north. I miss my friends and my dog. I hope to go back to my father's farm when the war ends.
data.description:
You are in the The room at the top of the tower.
Small and round, the room is accessed by a spiral staircase. The room has stone walls, wooden floors and a decoratively carved wooden rocking chair next to a which looks over the castle's moat and the meadows and woodlands beyond.
There's a spiral staircase, a wall, a moat, a woodland, a glass, a window, a meadow, and a wooden floors here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing an armor, and wielding a sword.

data.short_motivation: I need to hide myself from being seen by anyone.
data.mid_motivation: I want to attract the attention of other members of the military and the king as well to start searching for a missing soldier, who's me
data.long_motivation: I am planning to flee and go back to my father's farm
